com.syntifi.near.borshj

Class BorshBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.syntifi.near.borshj.BorshBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BorshInput, BorshOutput<BorshBuffer>

    public class BorshBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements BorshInput, BorshOutput<BorshBuffer>
    Borsh buffer implementation for both input/output operations
    Since:
    0.1.0

      • allocate

        @NonNull
public static BorshBuffer allocate(int capacity)
        Creates a BoshBuffer instance with given capacity. Whether it has a backing array is unspecified.
        Parameters:
        capacity - the capacity to allocate
        Returns:
        the BorshBuffer instance

      • allocateDirect

        @NonNull
public static BorshBuffer allocateDirect(int capacity)
        Creates a BoshBuffer instance with given capacity. It will have a backing array, and its array offset will be zero.
        Parameters:
        capacity - the capacity to allocate
        Returns:
        the BorshBuffer instance
